EmailTemplate.name: 201709_APAC_Event_GoDirectSeminar_mih.201709_APAC_Invite_GoDirectSeminar_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: You Are Invited to the GoDirect Connectivity Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOU ARE INVITED Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity Seminar - APAC 2017 Date Oct. 3
Time 9 a.m.-4:30 p.m.
Location PARKROYAL Melbourne Airport Arrival Drive, Melbourne Airport VIC 3045, Australia
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Honeywell’s GoDirect specialists will be visiting Asia Pacific. You are invited to come along and see and experience our latest cabin and cockpit solutions; technologies to enhance connectivity, safety and cost savings. Speak with our technical managers to understand more about our wide range of services that will benefit your pilots, passengers, maintenance and operators globally through time, efficiencies and cost savings.
We look forward to your participation for a better connection with you and your company.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_APAC_GoDirectSeminar.html]]>
Please RSVP by Sept. 20. Please feel free to forward this invite to whoever might be interested in this event.
Rick Wong Sales Manager – Pacific | BGA Honeywell | Aerospace Mobile: +61 481 902751 Rick.Wong@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Rick.Wong@Honeywell.com]]>
